SELECT A.GOV_METRIC_ID , A.GOV_METRIC_NM , B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID , REPLACE( REPLACE ( B.DETAIL_EVAL_NM, CHR(13), '' ), CHR(10), ' ' ) DETAIL_EVAL_NM , C.CONCEPT_ID , REPLACE( REPLACE ( C.CONCEPT_NM, CHR(13), '' ), CHR(10), ' ' ) CONCEPT_NM , D.PLAN_ID , REPLACE( REPLACE ( D.PLAN_NM, CHR(13), '' ), CHR(10), ' ' ) PLAN_NM , E.SC_DEPT_S_NM , F.USER_NM AS INSERT_USER_NM , COUNT (1) OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.GOV_METRIC_ID) AS GOV_METRIC_CNT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.GOV_METRIC_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER,D.PLAN_ID) AS GOV_METRIC_INDEX , COUNT (1) OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.GOV_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID ) AS DETAIL_EVAL_CNT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.GOV_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, D.SORT_ORDER,D.PLAN_ID ) AS DETAIL_EVAL_INDEX , COUNT (1) OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.GOV_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID, D.CONCEPT_ID ) AS CONCEPT_CNT , ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY A.YEAR, A.GOV_METRIC_ID, C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID, D.CONCEPT_ID ORDER BY A.SORT_ORDER, B.SORT_ORDER, C.SORT_ORDER, NVL(D.SORT_ORDER, 0),D.PLAN_ID) AS CONCEPT_INDEX FROM GOV_METRIC A
INNER JOIN GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_ITEM B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.GOV_METRIC_ID = B.GOV_METRIC_ID INNER JOIN GOV_DETAIL_EVAL_CONCEPT C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.DETAIL_EVAL_ID = C.DETAIL_EVAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GOV_ACTION_PLAN D ON C.YEAR = D.YEAR AND C.CONCEPT_ID = D.CONCEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_SC_DEPT E ON A.YEAR = E.YEAR AND A.SC_DEPT_ID = E.SC_DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_USERINFO F ON B.INSERT_USER_ID = F.USER_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear#
B.INSERT_USER_ID = #findEmpn#
AND A.GBN_ID = '02' AND A.DELETE_DT IS NULL START WITH A.UP_METRIC_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.YEAR = A.YEAR AND PRIOR A.GOV_METRIC_ID = A.UP_METRIC_ID ORDER BY NVL(A.SORT_ORDER, 0), A.GOV_METRIC_NM, NVL(B.SORT_ORDER, 0), B.DETAIL_EVAL_NM, NVL(C.SORT_ORDER, 0), C.CONCEPT_NM, NVL(D.SORT_ORDER, 0), D.PLAN_NM
